dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1389 IH: Increasing State Flexibility in Care Coordination for the Most Vulnerable Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bilirakis introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide States with flexibility to provide care coordination under Medicaid for the most vulnerable through managed care.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Increasing State Flexibility in Care Coordination for the Most Vulnerable Act of 2017.

section.header: State flexibility to provide care coordination under Medicaid for the most vulnerable through managed care
section.text: Section 1932(a)(2) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396uâ€“2(a)(2)) is amended by striking subparagraphs (A) and (B).
